name: Ambidexterity
description: Ability to use either hand with equal finesse.
effect: Do not suffer penalties when using either hand.

name: Loveable Drunk
description: An experienced drinker and accustomed with socializing when flooded with intoxicating substances

name: Eyes of a Hawk
description: Great eyesight at a distance. Able to focus and target over great distances.
effect: Treat medium distance the same as optimal distance

name: Whirlwind Defense
description: Even when surrounded you're able to defend against flanking and attacks from behind
effect: Opponent doesnt gain advantage over you if flanking or from behind if you're aware.

name: Instinct Strikes
description: Able to accurately attack opponents that can't be clearly seen.
effect: Able to attack without penalty against opponents that arent clearly seen or from behind or sides

name: Lightning Reflexes
effect: Add another die in combat (normally 6 for full combat go to 7)

name: Light Sleeper
description: Sleeping with one eye open. Slightest disturbance to danger will awaken to full alertness
effect: Much harder to catch unaware when asleep

name: Second skin
description: Lives, eats, and sleeps in armor and accustomed to the weight of armor.
effect: Able to sleep in armor without penalty. Reduce penalty for dodging with armor.
